name: Foliages
description:
The Foliages game is the project done in University. It is a 2D Side-scrolling game and kind of soul-like.

Did you know...

The end of the game is "To be continue" screen

There is a hidden message if you don't completely kill Boar

This game support Gamepad.
XBOX
Move - Left Stick
Attack - RT
Jump/Submit - A
Interact - Y
Evade/Cancel - B
Inventory - SELECT
Pause - START

PS
Move - Left Stick
Attack - R2
Jump/Submit - X
Interact - △
Evade/Cancel - O
Inventory - SELECT
Pause - START
